extendedInfo.description: You are running a tiny station. You need to serve coming vehicles efficiently to make money, so that you can buy more facilities, and hire more staffs in your station. Highlighted features:# A lot of facilities to be built.# Hire/upgrade employees as need. # Different kinds of services in the station, include charging, cafe, tire repair, etc.# Tens of types of vehicles to be served.# More than 20 achievements to be unlocked.Simple game rule:# Drag vehicles to the right facility.# Tap vehicle to start serving. # Item will help you in emergency case.Tips: Don't forget to upgrade your staff and facility! Good luck to run your tiny station!

reviews.title: dont buy...u wont get anything.
reviews.comment: this is a really good game but the down side is it takes too long to get coins. I advise you not to purchase coins because you wont get them. I bought some on august 15 and still havent got them. I even sent the company 2 emails about this and havent got any response from them!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too many coins needed to progess through game
reviews.comment: Good game. It cost too many coins to upgrade and purchase new equipment, which is not reflected in how many coibs you get at the end of a level plus the frequency of the machines needing to be repaired.
reviews.author: Patrick Barnes

reviews.title: Fun but uninstalling
reviews.comment: Good game, fun and time killer BUT for the money you earn afte each level u cant do the upgrades. After level 5 you pretty much will have to buy coins w real money in order to continue cuz wo the upgrades u cant complete the level anyway. Uninstalling. There r other games out that not making you pay. Sheesh these games r getting ridic :/
reviews.author: Jamie Williams

reviews.title: Designed to fail
reviews.comment: Fun for a minute but upgrades are WAAAAYYY too expensive even if you were to pay real money for extra coins to make the upgrades.  With making fixes or upgrading current stations, you could never afford additional NECESSARY stations or workers.  make it cheaper to deserve more stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but hard.
reviews.comment: This is a fun game but it is always tough. Would be fun, especially for kids, to be able to revisit earlier levels and complete them easily due to upgrades achieved. Even if less gold was awarded. Go for a PB on a level, etc.
reviews.author: brian hanly

reviews.title: Tinny not soo tiny
reviews.comment: This game is good butt haves some kicks like evert chqtcter is like 100000 dollar\'s ps u yet tobhave a new stion at level thrity qnd im on level 99
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: Sorry I would give more stars but it takes to much doe to create your little town and your help is way to expensive. Other than that its very addictive.
reviews.author: Kenny Mccroan

reviews.title: Great & addictive!
reviews.comment: Currently at level 250, and NOT spent a penny of real money. Yes, staff cost a lot of coins, but be clever with your basic staff & facilities upgrades. Concentrate on that first, then the levels will fly by. Gets fast tho, so be prepared!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Game is fun but the prices to upgrade, get new equipment and workers is extremely high. What I make for each level after servicing all cars isnt nearly enough to by new workers. They should come with the equipment instead of having to buy it separately.  I\'ll uninstall this game befors paying cash for coins....not gonna happen.
reviews.author: Starr Martin

reviews.title: Need a Repair All Button and more incentives or ways to earn coins
reviews.comment: I love this game is play most of droidhen\'s games this is the only I\'ve rated yet but all are great and better versions of similar games already out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Expensive
reviews.comment: Actually this game is fun when starting. But after few level feel give up and uninstall this game. Every upgrade is TOO EXPENSIVE even the worker also. Many think have to upgrade the worker need to upgrade, machine need to upgrade, add the machine and worker exprnsive. All of things is money, but after the level get money is just a little. OMG~
reviews.author: nico csv

reviews.title: Good  game, Possible upgrades
reviews.comment: Great time killer.  The only update I wish to see would be to have a button after each level to \"Fix All\" enabling you to fix all stations instead of individually selecting each one.
reviews.author: Brian Shaffer

reviews.title: Fun but must cost $$
reviews.comment: 1. Fun n addicting 2.Doesnt have menu to select level we want to play 3.Some how left player no choice. Must buy coins to upgrade.  Ex : 1 worker cost $16,000? Zzzzz....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Entertaining until...
reviews.comment: Yes, the beginning is difficult. But once you manage your way through it, it gets easier. Now I am past level 500, and the game will force close after each completed level. It is very annoying and discouraging.
reviews.author: MeLynda Williams

reviews.title: Tiny Station
reviews.comment: Greatest game ever it is really cool and fun. This is a game that is fun of excitement and challanges
reviews.author: Sandy Aguilar

reviews.title: Status Que
reviews.comment: Super boring, but one can definitely see huge fun potential here if the developer will do it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good BUT not great
reviews.comment: It is fun but hard but to me that makes it fun but cost way to much for lots of stuff.
reviews.author: Jawain Williams

reviews.title: They are Stealers. Dont buy anything. They wont deliver
reviews.comment: These people are stealers. They will take your money but wont give you anything in return. Droiden is bothered only about money nd they can do anything for it, even cheat. Wish i cud give zero stars for the stealers who ve developed the game. Otherthan that game is good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: fun at first and the not so much
reviews.comment: I unistalled and the reinstalled this game just so it could be fun. If you make a game like this too hard after so many levels, then it\'s not fun anymore. Isn\'t that what a GAME  is for!?!?!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea but wrong design
reviews.comment: It can be good game, but droidhen wants only money and because of its really boring for no paying players. And very stupid ads after almost every mission.
reviews.author: A Google User
